data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WnZjFB7wXvcQ7kNvgECpbXb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBtTIJ_Le6rOlut6t67sCB7B9vLb14H5w4igHtG8QkUTg&oe=66FA9F8C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I1YpC-8Eok4Q7kNvgFWKT_Z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFITStpO8YZSqQvUEUzt4f3Ax_myUggeOtUwzpneojKg&oe=66FA9D9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5K7ho40jRncQ7kNvgGTWXM_&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCfwPi9mYQq2_phmWA6GpLyyqCky1yN1LZVddG6d8lmjw&oe=66FA82F1)
